newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Gas explosion kills four in Moscow home.
newsitem.headline: Gas explosion kills four in Moscow home.

text.p: Four people were killed and three injured when a gas canister exploded in a home in eastern Moscow, Interfax news agency quoted Russia's ministry for emergency situations as saying on Wednesday.
Two of the injured people were detained in hospital and one was released after treatment. Experts were still investigating the cause of the blast, on the sixth floor of a nine-storey building.
